provider.selectSQL: SELECT s.sheetNumber, s.fuelId, f.fuelName, s.groupAccId, g.groupAccCode, g.groupAccName, CASE s.sheetState WHEN 1 THEN 'закрыта' ELSE ' ' END sheetState, sum(quantity) quantity FROM waybillsRefuellingSheets s INNER JOIN VehicleRefuelling r ON s.sheetNumber=r.sheetNumber AND s.fuelId=r.fuelId LEFT JOIN vf_groupAcc g ON g.groupAccId = s.groupAccId LEFT JOIN fuel f ON f.fuelId = s.fuelId WHERE s.fuelId = {_fuelId} AND s.groupAccId = {_groupAccId} AND s.sheetNumber = {_sheetNumber} GROUP BY s.sheetNumber, s.fuelId, f.fuelName, s.groupAccId, g.groupAccCode, g.groupAccName, s.sheetState
